tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE project_progress (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  group_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  design_iteration INT,
  progress_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE group_projects(
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE design_iterations(
    iteration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    iteration_number INT,
    iteration_description TEXT,
    iteration_date DATE,
    iteration_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES group_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name STRING,
    project_description STRING,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE design_iterations (
    iteration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id UUID REFERENCES projects(project_id),
    iteration_number INT,
    design_notes STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE student_progress (
    progress_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    iteration_id UUID REFERENCES design_iterations(iteration_id),
    student_name STRING,
    progress_description STRING,
    progress_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  team_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Teams (
  team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_id INT,
  team_lead_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (
  member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  team_id INT,
  role VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (team_id) REFERENCES Teams(team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DesignIterations (
  iteration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  iteration_number INT,
  iteration_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Projects_Students (
    project_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (project_id, student_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Design_Iterations (
    iteration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    iteration_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Progress_Tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    student_id INT,
    status TEXT,
    last_updated DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES Projects(project_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES Students(student_id)
);
